Patrick Michelberger

Information Systems (M.Sc.)
Technische Universität München

patrick.michelberger@tum.de

Data-driven software engineer
with entrepreneurial spirit.

I am a student in Information Systems (M.Sc.) at Technische Universität München. I currently write my master's thesis in the area of Big Data, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence. I’m also a full stack engineer and I enjoy designing and developing products from the ground up. I’ve helped a few startups to do that and also worked for clients such as BMW, Roche and ABOUT YOU.
